title: Puntozero Comptoir
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, European, French, Fusion, Spanish
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian restaurant serves all organic and local food such as cold-pressed fruit and vegetable juices and smoothies, gluten free bread and pastry, ice-creams, vegetable milks, natural wines and beers. All food is made-in-house from scratch. Run by 4 European women. Cozy atmosphere. Lunch and brunch served daily.
